summary: This document is a certificate of true copy from the Department of Transportation, confirming the records related to a specific aircraft, Raytheon Aircraft Company 400A, registration N727KB. It includes signatures from Michelle Endsley and Kevin F. Vest, affirming their roles and the authenticity of the records.

persons.name: Michelle Endsley
persons.context: Michelle Endsley certifies the authenticity of the aircraft records and is identified as the legal custodian of these records.

persons.name: Kevin F. Vest
persons.context: Kevin F. Vest affirms the certification provided by Michelle Endsley and is involved in the legal oversight of the aircraft registration.

keyFacts: The document certifies the records of the aircraft Raytheon Aircraft Company 400A, serial number RK-260, registration N727KB.
Michelle Endsley is the Supervisory Legal Instruments Examiner and the legal custodian of the aircraft records.
Kevin F. Vest is the Acting Manager of the Aircraft Registration Branch and supports the certification of the records.
The document is subject to protective orders as indicated in the reference.
